Name: Reverse Path
Description: Reverse the path, i.e. make the path's last point the first and its first point the last

Name: Mirror Path
Description: Mirror the path around its center position (horizontally)

Name: Flip Path
Description: Flip the path around its center position (vertically)

Name: Play
Description: Toggle between play and pause if the current editor has play controls

Name: Jump to End
Description: Jump to the end of an animation

Name: Jump to Start
Description: Jump to the start of an animation

Name: Add Broadcast Message
Description: Add a broadcast message at the playhead position

Name: ACE Dev Path Display
Description: Internal dev function for enabling the path display window

Name: Select Previous Tile Animation
Description: Select the previous tile animation (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Select Next Tile Animation
Description: Select the next tile animation (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Select Previous Tile Animation Frame
Description: Select the previous tile animation frame (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Select Next Tile Animation Frame
Description: Select the next tile animation frame (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Move Tile Animation Up
Description: Move the tile animation up (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Move Tile Animation Down
Description: Move the tile animation up (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Move Tile Animation Frame Left
Description: Move the tile animation frame left (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Move Tile Animation Frame Right
Description: Move the tile animation frame right (in the Tile Animation window)

Name: Centre Image with Unit Scale
Description: Show the image at its actual size

Name: Make Brush From Selection
Description: Make a brush from the current selection

Name: Import Frame From File
Description: Import a sprite frame from an image file

Name: Import From Strip
Description: Import sprites from an image strip file

Name: Export To PNG
Description: Export the current sprite as a PNG file

Name: Select Ellipse Tool - Outline
Description: Select the Ellipse tool and set it to draw an outlined ellipse

Name: Select Ellipse Tool - Filled
Description: Select the Ellipse tool and set it to draw a filled ellipse

Name: Select Fill Tool
Description: Select the Fill (or Paint Bucket) tool

Name: Select Polygon Tool - Outline
Description: Select the Polygon tool, ready to draw an outlined polygon

Name: Select Polygon Tool - Filled
Description: Select the Polygon tool, ready to draw a filled polygon

Name: Select Rectangle Tool - Outline
Description: Select Rectangle tool, ready to draw an outlined rectangle (Brush Builder Tools)

Name: Select Rectangle Tool - Filled
Description: Select the Rectangle tool, ready to draw a filled rectangle

Name: Select Rotate Image Tool
Description: Rotate the current brush clockwise by 90 degrees

Name: Select Auto Tile Tool
Description: Select auto tile tool (in the Brush Builder Tools)

Name: Auto Trim Frames
Description: Trim all the zero-alpha pixels from around the edges of a sprite

Name: Search Next
Description: Search the next occurrence of the text to search

Name: Search Previous
Description: Search the previous occurrence of the text to search

Name: SearchReplaceNext
Description: Globally search the next occurrence of the text to search

Name: SearchReplacePrevious
Description: Globally search the previous occurrence of the text to search

Name: New Library
Description: Internal dev - Make a new Drag and Drop Library

Name: Save As
Description: Save the current project under a different name

Name: Export Project
Description: Export the current project as a YYZ file

Name: Expand Localisation
Description: Internal dev - Expand the localisation strings

Name: Export Library
Description: Internal dev - Export the DnD library

Name: Preview Node
Description: Internal dev - Preview the current DnD node

Name: Evaluate Node
Description: Internal dev - Evaluate the current DnD node

Name: Test Layout
Description: Internal dev - Test the active layout

Name: Remove Test Layout
Description: Internal dev - Remove the active test layout

Name: Save Style
Description: Internal dev - Save the active style

Name: Save All Styles
Description: Internal dev - Save all selected styles

Name: Reload Images
Description: Internal dev - Reload all images from disk

Name: Open Instance Creation Order
Description: Open the instance creation order window

Name: Mirror As Individuals
Description: Mirror individual elements of selection horizontally

Name: Flip As Individuals
Description: Flip individual elements of selection vertically

Name: Toggle Smart Guide & Ruler
Description: Toggle the smart guides and ruler

Name: Go To Performance Test
Description: Internal Dev - Run GoTo Module performance test

Name: Remove Key Frame
Description: Remove the keyframes at the playhead position on the currently selected tracks

Name: Add Key Frame
Description: Add a keyframe at the playhead position for all selected items on the canvas

Name: Center Item Origin
Description: Center the selected items around their origins

Name: Reset Item Position
Description: Reset the position on the canvas of the currently selected items

Name: Toggle Translation Path
Description: Toggle translation paths on the canvas

Name: Move Playhead Left
Description: Move the playhead left by 1 frame

Name: Move Playhead Left 10
Description: Move the playhead left by 10 frames

Name: Move Playhead Right
Description: Move the playhead right by 1 frame

Name: Move Playhead Right 10
Description: Move the playhead right by 10 frames

Name: Move Keys Left
Description: Move the selected keys left by 1 frame

Name: Move Keys Left 10
Description: Move the selected keys left by 10 frames

Name: Move Keys Right
Description: Move the selected keys right by 1 frame

Name: Move Keys Right 10
Description: Move the selected keys right by 10 frames

Name: Move Canvas Items Left
Description: Move the selected items left on the canvas

Name: Move Canvas Items Left 10
Description: Move the selected items left on the canvas (10x)

Name: Move Canvas Items Right
Description: Move the selected items right on the canvas

Name: Move Canvas Items Right 10
Description: Move the selected items right on the canvas (10x)

Name: Move Canvas Items Up
Description: Move the selected items up on the canvas

Name: Move Canvas Items Up 10
Description: Move the selected items up on the canvas (10x)

Name: Move Canvas Items Down
Description: Move the selected items down on the canvas

Name: Move Canvas Items Down 10
Description: Move the selected items down on the canvas (10x)

Name: Go To Next Keyframe
Description: Move the playhead to the next keyframe in the selected parameter tracks

Name: Go To Previous Keyframe
Description: Move the playhead to the previous keyframe in the selected parameter tracks

Name: Select Next Key
Description: Move the playhead to the next key

Name: Select Previous Key
Description: Move the playhead to the previous key

Name: Go To Start
Description: Move the playhead to the start of the sequence

Name: Go To End
Description: Move the playhead to the end of the sequence

Name: Go To Start of Selection
Description: Move the playhead to the start of the selection

Name: Go To End of Selection
Description: Move the playhead to the end of the selection

Name: Expand Selected Tracks
Description: Toggle expand/collapse for the selected tracks in the Track Panel

Name: Select Track Above
Description: Select the track above the current track in the Track Panel

Name: Select Track Below
Description: Select the track below the current track in the Track Panel

Name: Select Track Above Additive
Description: Add the track above the current track to the selection in the Track Panel

Name: Select Track Below Additive
Description: Add the track below the current track to the selection in the Track Panel

Name: New Clipping Mask
Description: Add a new clipping mask track

Name: New Group
Description: Create a new group track and add the selected tracks to it

Name: New Moment
Description: Add a new moment at the playhead position

Name: Go To Next Event
Description: Move the playhead to the next moment

Name: Go To Previous Event
Description: Move the playhead to the previous moment

Name: Debug
Description: Continue code execution in the debugger

Name: Package
Description: Create an executable package using the current target settings

Name: Step Into
Description: Step into the current statement or function in the debugger

Name: Step Over
Description: Step over the current statement in the debugger

Name: Step Out
Description: Step out of the current statement or function in the debugger

Name: Do Nothing Reprint
Description: Internal dev command - reprint the current script

Name: Find All References
Description: Find All References to the selected asset

Name: Rename Identifier
Description: Rename the identifier that the cursor is currently at in the Code Editor

Name: Create Tile Set
Description: Create a new tile set asset

Name: Create Animation Curve
Description: Create a new animation curve asset

Name: Create Particle System
Description: Create a new particle system asset

Name: feather_lint_messages_show
Description: Bring up the Feather Messages window

Name: Edit Sprite
Description: Open the Image Editor when having a sprite selected in the workspace

Name: Open Search in Script
Description: Open a code or shader editor's Find and Replace in Find mode

Name: Open Replace in Script
Description: Open a code or shader editor's Find and Replace in Replace mode

Name: Workspace Overview Flow Backwards
Description: Go one back in the Workspace Overview window

Name: New Sprite
Description: Create a new sprite asset for the active asset and open it in the Sprite Editor

Name: Edit Image
Description: Edit the image of the sprite assigned to the active asset

Name: Add Child
Description: Add a child object to the current object

Name: Add Event
Description: Add an event to the current object

Name: Add Variable
Description: Add a new variable to the current object's Variable Definitions

Name: Modify Collision Shape
Description: Modify the object's physics collision shape

Name: Open Variable Definitions
Description: Open the object's Variable Definitions window

Name: Select Mask
Description: Select a mask sprite for the object (opens the Select Mask window)

Name: Add 47 Tile Set
Description: Add a full auto tile set (Auto Tiling window)

Name: Add 16 Tile Set
Description: Add an auto tile transition set (Auto Tiling window)

Name: Expand Collapse Docks
Description: Toggle whether docked windows are expanded or collapsed

Name: Move Focus Next
Description: Move focus to the next IDE element

Name: Move Focus Previous
Description: Move focus to the next IDE element

Name: Pan Area Zoom
Description: Hold while scrolling the mouse wheel

Name: Paint With Resource Precise Item Placement
Description: Paint with the selected resource performing precise item placement

Name: Restrict Translation Axis
Description: Restrict the translation axis to allow only horizontal or vertical movement

Name: Open Colour Panel On Select
Description: Hold to bring up the colour picker when selecting a left (LMB) or right colour (RMB) instead

Name: Arc Tool Move Control Point
Description: Move the arc's first control point

Name: Arc Tool Move Control Point Alt
Description: Move the arc's second control point

Name: Colour Replacer Tool Replace With Alpha
Draw Regular Shape
Description: Draw a regular shape (a square instead of a rectangle, a circle instead of an ellipse, etc.)

Name: Add Range
Description: Add a range of characters to the font

Name: Caret Left + Select
Description: Move the text cursor left and add words to selection

Name: Caret Right + Select
Description: Move the text cursor right and add words to selection

Name: Caret Up + Select
Description: Move the text cursor up and add to selection

Name: Caret Down + Select
Description: Move the text cursor down and add to selection

Name: Caret Left + Column Select
Description: Move the text cursor left and add to column selection

Name: Caret Right + Column Select
Description: Move the text cursor right and add to column selection

Name: Caret Up + Column Select
Description: Move the text cursor up and add to column selection

Name: Caret Down + Column Select
Description: Move the text cursor down and add to column selection

Name: Page Up
Description: Jump up a page (in text editors)

Name: Page Down
Description: Jump down a page (in text editors)

Name: Page Up + Select
Description: Jump up a page and add to selection (in text editors)

Name: Page Down + Select
Description: Jump down a page and add to selection (in text editors)

Name: Scroll Up + Select
Description: Scroll up and add to selection

Name: Scroll Down + Select
Description: Scroll down and add to selection

Name: Home
Description: Jump to start of line or start of actual code

Name: Home + Select
Description: Jump to start of line or start of actual code while selecting everything in between

Name: End + Select
Description: Jump to end of line while selecting everything in between

Name: Home + Column Select
Description: Jump to start and add to column select

Name: End + Column Select
Description: Jump to end and add to column select

Name: Document Start
Description: Move the text cursor to the start of the document

Name: Document End
Description: Move the text cursor to the end of the document

Name: Document Start + Select
Description: Move the text cursor to the start of the document and select everything in between

Name: Document End + Select
Description: Move the text cursor to the end of the document and select everything in between

Name: Move Token Left
Description: Move the text cursor to the next word or token to the left of its current position

Name: Move Token Right
Description: Move the text cursor to the next word or token to the right of its current position

Name: Move Token Left + Select
Description: Move the text cursor to the next word or token to the left of its current position while selecting everything in between

Name: Move Token Right + Select
Description: Move the text cursor to the next word or token to the right of its current position while selecting everything in between

Name: Indent
Description: Indent the selected lines of code

Name: Unindent
Description: Unindent the selected lines of code

Name: Delete Word Start
Description: Delete the entire word left of the cursor

Name: Delete Word End
Description: Delete the entire word right of the cursor

Name: Delete Line Start
Description: Delete the line before the cursor

Name: Delete Line End
Description: Delete the line after the cursor

Name: Show Snippets
Description: Bring up the code snippets popup

Name: Previous Region
Description: Move the cursor to the previous region

Name: Next Region
Description: Move the cursor to the next region

Name: Set Range
Description: Set the range on the y axis

Name: Insert Block Snippet
Description: Insert a code block snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert If Snippet
Description: Insert an if statement snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert If-Else Snippet
Description: Insert an if-else statement snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert For Loop Snippet
Description: Insert a for loop at the cursor position

Name: Insert For Loop (i..n) Snippet
Description: Insert a for loop with counter variable at the cursor position

Name: Insert While Loop Snippet
Description: Insert a while loop snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Do-Until Loop Snippet
Description: Insert a do-until loop snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Repeat Snippet
Description: Insert a repeat statement snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Switch Snippet
Description: Insert a switch statement snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert With Snippet
Description: Insert a with statement snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Line Comment Snippet
Description: Insert a single line comment snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Multi-line Comment Snippet
Description: Insert a multi-line comment snippet at the cursor position

Name: Insert Region Snippet
Description: Insert a region snippet at the cursor position

Name: Replace Next Occurence
Description: Replace the next occurrence of the searched text

Name: Comment
Description: Comment the current line or selection

Name: Uncomment
Description: Uncomment the current line or selection

Name: TE2_Duplicate
Description: Duplicate the current line of text or selection

Name: ConvertToProperCase
Description: Convert the selection to Proper Case

Name: ConvertToSentenceCase
Description: Convert the selection to Sentence case

Name: DeleteWordStart
Description: Delete the entire word left of the cursor

Name: DeleteWordEnd
Description: Delete the entire word right of the cursor

Name: LineBreak
Description: Insert a line break at the cursor position

Name: TextCursorDocStart
Description: Move the text cursor to the start of the current document

Name: TextCursorAllDocsStart
Description: Move the text cursor to the start of the all documents

Name: TextCursorHome
Description: Move the text cursor to the start of the current line or the start of the code on the current line

Name: TextCursorDocEnd
Description: Move the text cursor to the end of the current document

Name: TextCursorAllDocsEnd
Description: Move the text cursor to the end of the all documents

Name: TextCursorEnd
Description: Move the text cursor to the end of the current line

Name: TextCursorPageUp
Description: Move the text cursor a page up

Name: TextCursorPageDown
Description: Move the text cursor a page down

Name: MoveToNextHistory
Description: Move to the next item in the history

Name: MoveToPreviousHistory
Description: Move to the previous item in the history

Name: NextRegion
Description: Move to the next code region

Name: PreviousRegion
Description: Move to the previous code region

Name: FindUsagesHotkey
Description: Finds all usages of the identifier and displays them in the Search Results window
